    Method that resets the candidate cells saved in the CLI IMPORTANT: use this each time before sending the answer to the server

    Method that is launched when the CLI starts and handles the action to perform in regard to the command entered by by the user in an infinite cycle

    Method that sets the cellsToPrint[] with the content that it gets from the nodeboard (board in xml format that this CLI has received from the server)

    • getCellNodeGivenTheID

      public org.w3c.dom.Node getCellNodeGivenTheID​(int cellnodeid)
      Method that returns the node of the cell that has a certain id from the board in xml format (nodeboard of the class)
      Parameters:
      cellnodeid - is of the cell node that is being found
      Returns:
      the cell node found with the given id, null if there were no cells in the board given by the server

      Returns:

      Method to get the nickname of a cell given its node
      Parameters:
      cellnode - node in xml format from which to get the nickname (it can be an empty string if the cell has no nikcname)
      Returns:
      the nickname associated to the cell

      Method to get the dome of a cell given its node
      Parameters:
      cellnode - node in xml format from which to get the dome
      Returns:
      true fi the call has a dome, otherwise false
